#### Description 

Check if a string vector is in hexadecimal color format

#### Usage
<pre><code>
is.hexcolor(x)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 
* x: A string vectors

#### Examples
```{r}
x <- c("#f0f0f0", "#FFf", "#99990000", "#00FFFFFF")
is.hexcolor(x)
```
